channel.title: CVE Feed for Till Krüss -- Email Address Encoder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Till Krüss -- Email Address Encoder

item.title: CVE-2023-48765|2023-12-15T13:56:57.959Z -- till%20kr%C3%BCss -- email%20address%20encoder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Till Krüss Email Address Encoder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Email Address Encoder: from n/a through 1.0.22.
